task.title: Activate Nodes in Command Tab
task.shortdesc: Graph nodes using the Command Tab with the following steps.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

step.cmd: Select desired nodes, either manually or by clicking a Set or Class type.

step.info: Steps can be performed in any order, with the verb select before or after the Set or Class type.

taskbody.postreq: Actions are automatically executed when a selected Set or Class type is combined with a Verb.
